email_body:
I am Dr Micheal Ossai, I need your assistance in transfering 
of (USD14m) and the money is been deposited in a 
SECURITY COMPANY and subsequent investment in 
properties in your country.you will be required to 
(1) Assist in the transfer of the said sum 
(2) Advise on lucrative areas for investment 
(3) Assist us in purchase of properties. 
If you decide to render your service to us in 
this regard, 20% of the total sum will be 
for you. 

yours faithfully, 

Dr micheal ossai
